module.title: Emergency Neurological Life Support
module.comments: This is the first version of ENLS

node.explanation:
Outpatient workup:
  • Start on antithrombotic agent (ASA, clopidogrel 75 mg/day, or ASA/ extended release dipyridamole)
  • Carotid imaging: ultrasound, CTA or MRA
  • Consider echocardiography
  • Consider long-term cardiac monitor*
  • Smoking cessation
  • Initiate statin
    • *- if ECG or rhythm strip shows atrial fibrillation consider starting anticoagulation (oral anticoagulant or low molecular weight heparin) or ASA depending on CHAD2 score.
